post:
Hello Low End Talk,

Today I bring news of some brand new offers from Superior Networks. These are the very latest offer's and have been specificity designed for the Low End Talk community! If you cant find the combination you are looking for in any of these plans please drop me a PM and I can give you a price for your exact specifications. 

LET-01 Plan:

 - 512 MB of RAM
 - 100 GB Storage
 - Unlimited Bandwidth Allowance
 - 1 IPV4 Address
 - DDoS Protection
 - £2.00 GBP Per Month
 
 Buy: https://www.superior-networks.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=53

LET-02 Plan:

 - 1GB of RAM
 - 130 GB Storage
 - Unlimited Bandwidth Allowance
 - 1 IPV4 Address
 - DDoS Protection
 - £3.00 GBP Per Month
 
 Buy: https://www.superior-networks.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54

LET-03 Plan:

 - 2GB of RAM
 - 150 GB Storage
 - Unlimited Bandwidth Allowance
 - 1 IPV4 Address
 - DDoS Protection
 - £4.50 GBP Per Month
 
 Buy: https://www.superior-networks.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=55
 
These are just some of the plans we have to offer and have been built specificity for the Low End Community, we do offer "Build Your Own" plans where you can custom build your server to the exact specifications you require, and if you cant find your exact match there we can organize it for you. 

For those wishing to test our servers we have the IP superior-networks.com. If you wish to download some test files or run some ping tests we have a looking glass that you can use at https://www.superior-networks.com/lg/ and is available for our French Location.

These plans will be available for at least the next 2 weeks or until we launch a new batch of offers for you all!

Have a great day,

Ryan
